text: Erminio Valenti (1564–1670) was a Roman Catholic cardinal. ==Biography== On 18 Sep 1605, he was consecrated bishop by Pietro Aldobrandini, Archbishop of Ravenna, with Ludovico de Torres, Archbishop of Monreale, and Laudivio Zacchia, Bishop of Corneto e Montefiascone, serving as co-consecrators. ==References== ==External links and additional sources== * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) Category:1564 births Category:1618 deaths Category:Cardinals (Catholic Church)
title: Erminio Valenti
